import "./messenger.css" import Topbar from "../../components/topbar/Topbar" import Conversation from "../../components/conversation/Conversation" import Message from "../../components/message/Message" import ChatOnline from "../../components/chatOnline/ChatOnline" import { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react" import { AuthContext } from "../../context/AuthContext" import axios from "axios" export default function Messenger() { const [conversations, setConversations] = useState([]); const { user } = useContext(AuthContext); useEffect(() => { const getConversation = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get("/conversation/" + user._id); console.log(res); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } getConversation(); }, [user._id]) return ( <>
) }
